description:
The talk presents the implementation of a local
search engine using Dancer and Elasticsearch. The focus is on the three elements of a search engine and their implementation:

1. Crawler
2. Indexer + Elasticsearch
3. Search and results presentation 

http://act.yapc.eu/ye2016/talk/6753
title: Max Maischein: A local search engine using Elasticsearch and Dancer - YAPC::Europe 2016‎
